body:
Day 10 - Manga 179*
Better than the last one but still not that good. At least I could understand what was happening.
Also, bulba, are you based when it comes to Yuri? Most of them you give a good score. Not trying to say that you can't, just asking.
2/10.
Reading this will make you forever immune to all curses in the future. All chain letters or comments are now null and void forever.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
